title: Update Quota Factor Message
description: Notifies the listener of a change to the applicable quota factor

percentage.description: The factor must be between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive

validFrom.description: The time at which the new factor takes affect.
validFrom.title: The validFrom schema

factor.description: The factor to be applied to configured quotas. A factor of 0.0 implies there is no quota available, a factor of 1.0 implies no additional restrictions.
factor.title: The factor schema
